EmailTemplate.name: 19_0322 Waitlist Portal Activation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Portal is Live
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Get to know your BlueWave Community Solar portal! Once your community solar subscription is live you can use your BlueWave Portal to:
Chat with a member of the BlueWave Customer Care team Submit and manage support cases View your statements and make payments Manage your autopay account information
Click the link below and login using the username, {!Receiving_User.Username}. If this is your first time logging into the portal, please click the link to create a new password.
Log Into Your Portal Here
We will send you an email once solar credits from your shared solar farm start flowing to your electric account.
Thanks for joining the Wave, we're happy you're here.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
